data.title: Frank Miller: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Frank Miller: Check out the list of all Frank Miller movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Frank Miller news on Times of India.
data.text:
'Sin City' TV series in works with Frank Miller to adapt the comics

PTI / Nov 17, 2019, 11:48 (IST)

"Sin City" author Frank Miller has locked a deal with popular production house to adapt the comics as a TV series.

Darren Aronofsky wanted to cast Joaquin Phoenix in his Batman movie

PTI / Sep 17, 2017, 12:55 (IST)

Warner Bros had roped in Darren Aronofsky to direct a Batman movie post the George Clooney-led 'Batman & Robin', but things could not materialise as the script had many differences from the original comic.

'Sin City' getting TV reboot

PTI / Jun 02, 2017, 12:35 (IST)

Iconic comic series "Sin City" is getting a reboot in the form of a television show.

Girl Power: A look at popular female superheroes

TNN / Jul 24, 2014, 00:00 (IST)

The next Thor will reportedly be played by a woman. This puts the spotlight on other well-known female action heroes

300: Rise of an Empire

TNN / Jun 12, 2013, 15:54 (IST)

“300: Rise of an Empire” pits Themistokles against the massive invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes, and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

Row over Samuel L Jackson’s portrayal

TNN / Apr 22, 2012, 00:00 (IST)

Fans are venting on the internet about African-American Samuel L Jackson’s portrayal of the ‘white’ Nick Fury in an upcoming movie

New trailer of Robert Pattinson-starrer superhero movie 'The Batman' drops at 2021 DC FanDome

PTI / Oct 17, 2021, 09:27 (IST)

Filmmaker Matt Reeves's 'The Batman' brought the curtains down on 2021 DC FanDome as he unveiled an explosive and action-packed trailer for Robert Pattinson-starrer superhero movie.

Robin is already dead in 'Batman vs Superman', reveals Affleck

PTI / Mar 12, 2016, 19:18 (IST)

The 43-year-old's character faces of with Superman in the Zack Snider's sequel to 'Man of Steel' with the trailer promissing "the greatest gladiator match in the history of the world."

Jessica Alba worked out hard for 'Sin City 2'

TNN / Aug 14, 2014, 15:47 (IST)

When Jessica Alba landed a stripper's role in "Sin City 2: A Dame To Kill For" a decade after "Sin City", she realised she had to seek additional help to get back in shape for her character.

Jena Malone to play Barbra Gordon in 'Batman v Superman'

PTI / Aug 01, 2015, 12:20 (IST)

'Hunger Games' actress Jena Malone will reportedly play Barbra Gordon, who has two alter egos Batgirl and Oracle, in the upcoming superhero film 'Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice'.

Ryan Gosling, Josh Brolin set to battle for Batman's role

TNN / Aug 08, 2013, 00:00 (IST)

Ryan Gosling and Josh Brolin are the top contenders for the role of Batman in Zack Snyder’s Man of Steel sequel

Book on Osama’s killing

Sep 12, 2011, 00:00 (IST)

A US Marine has co-created a graphic novel on the death of Osama bin Laden

Avantika and I have our share of fights: Imran Khan

Mumbai Mirror / Sep 18, 2013, 00:00 (IST)

Imran Khan talks about his marriage, his love for graphic novels and why he finds the education system of the country flawed
